title: i dont want to spend all my money on rp but i really want final boss veiger plz

replies.body: While we can't simply gift skins like that, there may be another way to find Final Boss Veigar.  He can be obtained through Hextech Crafting as a shard, and with enough essence you may be able to unlock him.  More information on that is available at our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).  Best of luck!
